Package persistence

Class RepositorioOrganizacao

java.lang.Object
persistence.RepositorioOrganizacao
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class RepositorioOrganizacao
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class responsible for creating a repository to store information about organization.
